title: ISic000572. I.Sicily inscription 000572
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) ((·)) M(anibus)
M(arco) ((·)) Virginio
Pompeio ((·)) fil(io)
bene ((·)) merenti
5vixit ((·)) annis ((·)) XXV
Pompeia
Atti[cill]a ((·)) mater

Apparatus criticus

Text: CIL; Gualtherus: ATTI[LICI]A

English translation

To the shades of the underworld. For Marcus Virginius Pompeius, who lived for 25 years. Pompeia Atti[cill]a his mother [built this] for her well deserving son

commentary
